entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Blowing snow near the Richardson mountains overnight. Wind light except east 30 km/h gusting to 50 near the Richardson mountains overnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 12 January 2023
